```{ojs}
//| echo: false

import { aq, op } from "@uwdata/arquero"; 

url = "https://datacomp.opensky-network.org/api/rankings";
rrr = await aq.loadJSON(url);

ranks = {
  aq.addFunction("parse_posix", d3.timeParse("%s"), { override: true });

  let r = rrr
    // .derive({ submission_date: (d) => op.parse_posix(d.timestamp) })
    .orderby("rank")
    .select("team_name", "rank", "file_version", "mse");
  return r;
}
Inputs.table(ranks, { sort: "ranks"})
```
